fullText:
Sneaky Gnome

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite: 11th level, gnome, rogue, Sneak Attack class feature
Benefit: Once per encounter when you attack and deal Sneak Attack damage to a creature while you are invisible, the invisibility does not end as a result of the attack.

Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 143.
name: Sneaky Gnome
prerequisite: 11th level, gnome, rogue, Sneak Attack class feature
benefit: Once per encounter when you attack and deal Sneak Attack damage to a creature while you are invisible, the invisibility does not end as a result of the attack.
